Dialogue.Page: Those little creatures suffered the fate of <color=purple>my immense power.</color>
Their foolish actions led them to <color=purple>my domain.</color>
Tampering with the 4th dimension was not, is not, and will <color=purple>NEVER</color> be a good idea.
You're lucky I'm keeping you alive.
I have a task for you.
You may have lots of questions, so I'd like to answer them first.
<color=purple>Then I'll make that knowledge go down the drain.</color>
Here's your task: There is a time paradox that will break the fabric of the universe at any moment.
For some reason, I feel as if I can trust you with this.
You must reset time back to a point. That will prevent the paradox.
Now walk forward. I'll fill you in with the details.
